content:
[PAGE 1]
CITY OF BERKELEY TRANSPORTATION COMMISSION
SPECIAL MEETING
February 10, 2026

CALL TO ORDER

ITEM 1: BIKE NETWORK EXPANSION
Staff reviewed protected lane options and phased implementation schedule.
Commission discussion highlighted safety at major intersections and school routes.

ITEM 2: TRANSIT SIGNAL PRIORITY
Presentation on corridor-level transit delay reduction.
No formal vote taken.

PUBLIC COMMENT
Residents requested better curb management and bus stop accessibility.

ADJOURNMENT
